alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:20PM EDT until July 13 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clinton County in northern New York... Northeastern Essex County in northern New York... Northwestern Addison County in central Vermont... Southwestern Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 320 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Witherbee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Vergennes, Essex, Moriah, Willsboro, Westport, Elizabethtown, Monkton Ridge, Monkton, Monkton Boro, Port Henry, Addison, Keeseville, Shelburne, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Waltham, Panton, Mt. Philo State Park, Kingsland Bay State Park, and D A R State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
